short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Increase the prices a little on webpages to avoide psychology misleading.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you angry about the price $xx.99? That make it sounds cheaper. This extension can increase those prices a little to a higher *level* to avoid these misleading.

e.g. from $56.71 to $56.99 will become $57.

version 3.0.1
 - Fixed a bug

version 3.0
 - Added support for Chinese websites!
 - Stop modifying two bank websites(Going to stop replacing for all bank websites).
 - Added support of replacing price like $198 with $200.
 - Fixed a bug
 - Added a small icon after the modified price, when mouse over the icon, it will show the original price.
